# contentColorVolume

**Type Property**

Matches payload of ITU-T-H.265:11/2019, D.2.40 Content Colour Volume SEI message. The value of this key is of [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMFormatDescription/Extensions-swift.struct/Value/ContentColorVolume] type.

## Declaration

```swift
@backDeployed(before: macOS 26.0, iOS 26.0, tvOS 26.0, watchOS 26.0, visionOS 26.0)
static var contentColorVolume: CMFormatDescription.Extensions.Key { get }
```
title: contentColorVolume
